mapper.update: update user set nickname=#{nickname}, phone=#{phone}, email=#{email}, modified_date=now() where user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: select password from user where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.update: update user set password = #{password} where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from user where nickname=#{nickname}

select review.user_id, review.write_date, review.total_likes, review.content, review.movieID, movie.title from review left join movie on review.movieID=movie.movieID where user_id=#{user_id} order by review.write_date desc;
select * from inquiry where user_id=#{user_id} order by write_date desc
select * from inquiry_lost where user_id=#{user_id} order by write_date desc;
select booking.user_id, booking.pay_tid, booking.booking_time, payment.item_name from booking left join payment on booking.pay_tid=payment.tid where user_id=#{user_id} order by booking_time desc;
